title: Discount
description: This is an offer from the supplier to the purchaser, to reduce the payment amount if the payment is made within a certain period of time.

xdm:code.title: Code
xdm:code.description: The description of the discountValue attribute. e.g percentage, currency, 3for2 etc. Can be enumerated, custom values allowed.

xdm:value.title: Value
xdm:value.description: If the discount code indicates a percentage or similar formulaic value, it is represented here, can be percentage or currency amount.
